plays.text: Goal scored by Alexander Mogilny assisted by Darcy Tucker and Shayne Corson
Penalty to Jonas Hoglund 2 minutes for Holding Miroslav Satan
Goal scored by James Patrick assisted by Miroslav Satan and Maxim Afinogenov
Goal scored by Rhett Warrener assisted by Chris Gratton and Taylor Pyatt
Penalty to Alexei Zhitnik 2 minutes for Holding Mats Sundin
Goal scored by Travis Green assisted by Darcy Tucker and Alexander Mogilny
Penalty to Taylor Pyatt 2 minutes for Holding Tie Domi
Goal scored by Gary Roberts assisted by Mats Sundin and Alexander Mogilny
Penalty to Mats Sundin 2 minutes for Holding Tim Connolly
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Chris Gratton
Penalty to Bryan McCabe 2 minutes for Roughing Chris Gratton
Penalty to Maxim Afinogenov 2 minutes for Interference Travis Green
Penalty to Mats Sundin 10 minutes for Misconduct(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Alexander Mogilny 2 minutes for Interference Alexei Zhitnik
